location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 58: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Samuel Manesty reports on the movements of the Elizaand the Scorpion.In addition, he encloses a duplicate of a letter (no. 59), dated 3 November 1785, which gives an account of the seizure of an Indian servant whom Manesty had entrusted with some Company packets.
